arts.ttl: Leverkusen say Boniface will stay amid Saudi bid
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen coach Xabi Alonso said Wednesday that Nigerian striker Victor Boniface is set to stay at the club following reports of a possible transfer to Saudi Arabia.

arts.ttl: Wirtz scores again as Leverkusen qualify for last 16 after win over Sparta Prague
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Florian Wirtz grabs his sixth Champions League goal of the season as Bayer Leverkusen cruise to victory over an already-eliminated Sparta Prague and earn automatic qualification to the last 16.

arts.ttl: Wirtz scores again as Leverkusen qualify for last 16 after win over Sparta Prague
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Florian Wirtz grabs his sixth Champions League goal of the season as Bayer Leverkusen cruise to victory over an already-eliminated Sparta Prague and earn automatic qualification to the last 16.

arts.ttl: Champions League knockout draw: Date, possible fixtures, format, bracket
arts.sum: The draw for the knockout playoff round of the new-look UEFA Champions League is upon us. Here's when it takes place and how it works.

arts.ttl: Champions League: Leverkusen and Lille in top eight as Atalanta fall short
arts.sum: Atalanta slip to ninth place with 2-2 draw at Barcelona Bayern and Real Madrid also in playoffs despite wins Barcelona were held to 2-2 draw at home to Atalanta, who missed out on an automatic place in the Champions League last 16 due to results elsewhere. Lamine Yamal gave Barcelona the lead two minutes into the second half, but Éderson levelled for Atalanta 20 minutes later with a stunning effort from the edge of the area. Ronald Araújo headed home from a corner to restore Barça’s lead soon after, before Mario Pasalic levelled again for the visitors with a fine nutmegged finish. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Emiliano Buendía: Who is the Aston Villa midfielder on loan at Bayer Leverkusen?
arts.sum: Buendía's move to Aston Villa followed an English Championship-winning season with Norwich City in 2020/21. Emiliano Buendía brings a wealth of English Premier League experience with him to Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Champions League play-offs and knockout bracket as Premier League quartet learn fate
arts.sum: All 36 teams competing in this year's new-look Champions League played their final league fixture, with some banking a play-off place and others moving through to the Round of 16

arts.ttl: Leverkusen see off Sparta Prague to seal quarter-final berth
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen rounded off their Champions League group phase by hosting Sparta Prague this evening which resulted in a 2-0 victory.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Sparta Prague
arts.sum: Official team news has just been released for Die Werkself who host Sparta Prague to round off the group phase on Matchday 8 of the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 'on the verge' of transfer agreement amid mega bids for Jhon Duran and Ollie Watkins
arts.sum: Al-Nassr are reportedly on the verge of reaching a verbal agreement with Aston Villa over signing Jhon Duran. Then, after assisting Jacob Ramsey in the draw with West Ham last weekend, Watkins reached 100 goal involvements in the fewest Premier League games (169) by any player since Kevin De Bruyne achieved the milestone in 155 matches in July 2020.
